= camel update

Update Camel project


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel update [options]
----


== Subcommands

[cols="2,5",options="header"]
|===
| Subcommand | Description
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-update-list.adoc[list] | List available update versions for Camel and its runtime variants
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-update-run.adoc[run] | Update Camel project
|===



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
